title: Can I find a skin I refunded on "your shop"?
body: I once refunded the skin iblitzcrank, but i d like to buy it again if it happens to be discounted. Thanks in advance for any answer

replies.body: You should be able to refund it with a token, per the[ refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If you're out of tokens or exceeded 90 days, I can't make any guarantees, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can offer assistance.
